ideas.title: Fog News Network
ideas.premise: A news anchor struggles to read the teleprompter due to the infamously dense San Francisco fog rolling directly into the studio.
ideas.why_funny: Relatable San Francisco weather absurdity and news anchor struggles.

ideas.title: Alcatraz Escape Update
ideas.premise: A news report shows seagulls escaping Alcatraz, carrying tiny newspapers with headlines like 'Worms Scarce' and 'Ocean Too Salty'.
ideas.why_funny: Absurd twist on the famous escape, commentary on gull-related 'news'.

ideas.title: Tech Bubble Bursting News
ideas.premise: A news report shows venture capitalists desperately trying to reinflate a giant, leaking tech bubble with bicycle pumps.
ideas.why_funny: Satire of the tech industry, bubble metaphor visually funny.

ideas.title: Housing Market Report
ideas.premise: A news anchor reports that a studio apartment in San Francisco is now considered a 'starter castle'.
ideas.why_funny: Exaggerated humor about the outrageous SF housing market.

ideas.title: Golden Gate Bridge Traffic Alert
ideas.premise: A news alert interrupts a nature program showing a single autonomous vehicle causing a massive traffic jam on the Golden Gate Bridge.
ideas.why_funny: Humorously portrays the potential pitfalls of autonomous vehicle technology.
